sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示人的"能力，才能"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ability, capacity, capability, genius, talent, competence, faculty, gift, aptitude
means: ability ：普通用词，指人先天的或学来的各种能力。
capacity ：侧重指人的潜在能力，通常不指体力，多指才智，尤指接受与领悟能力。
capability ：多用于人，指胜任某项具体工作的能力，也指本身具有、尚未发挥的潜在能力。常与of或for连用。
genius ：语气最强，指天赋的高度才能与智力。
talent ：着重指人某方面具有可发展和倍养的突出天赋才能，但语意比genius弱。
competence ：正式用词，侧重指令人满意的业务能力与水平，达到胜任某项工作等的要求。
gift ：着重个人的天赋的才能或在某方面的显著本领，常暗含不能用一般规律作解释的意味。
aptitude ：多指先天或后天习得的运用自如的能力，常暗示接受能力强，能迅速掌握一种学术训练或艺术技巧。

sentence.Network_en: Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentence.Network_en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentence.Network_en: Depression lowers the human ability to cope with disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 抑郁症会降低人体对疾病的抵抗力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 而能力(ability)是一个人比较稳定的个性心理特征，它表现在人们掌握知识和技能的难易、快慢、深浅、巩固程度以及应用知识解决实 …
而字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 如,好象〖 seem;like〗 才能〖 ability〗 能够〖 can〗.
器_百度百科 ... [weapon and farm implements] 兵器与农具 [ability] 才具;才干 [talent] 比喻人才.
"The kernel of intelligence and ability is the thinking."“思维是智力和能力的核心”，所以，要培养学生的创造能力，就必须要培养学生的思维能力。

心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... learning 学习 learning ability 学习能力 learning activity 学习活动.
汽车词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 织物纹里铝合金 textured aluminum extrution 爬坡能力 grade ability 排水阀 drain valve.
陈欣淇　Julie Tan_新加坡演员吧_百度贴吧 ... 体重 Weight 语言能力 Language Ability 兴趣 Hobby.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French ablete, from Latin habilitas, from habilis 'able'

encyclopedia.content: 词形变化： abilities n. 能力，才能 例句用法 1.This is a task well within your ability. 这完全是你力所能及的工作。 2.It's hard to measure his ability when we haven't seen his work. 没有见过他的作品，很难估计他的能力。 3.He owes his success more to luck than to ability. 他认为他的成功是靠运气而不是因为自己有能力。 4.She felt satisfaction at having her ability recognized. 她因自己的才能得到赏识而满

entry.def: Your ability to do something is the fact that you can do it.

example.ex: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job...
example.tran: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

example.ex: He has the ability to bring out the best in others.

entry.def: Your ability is the quality or skill that you have which makes it possible for you to do something.

example.ex: Her drama teacher spotted her ability...
example.tran: 她的戏剧老师发现了她的才能。

example.ex: I have confidence in the ability of the players...
example.tran: 我对于球员们的能力充满信心。

entry.def: If you do something to the best of your abilities or to the best of your ability, you do it as well as you can.

example.ex: I take care of them to the best of my abilities...
example.tran: 我尽我所能地照顾他们。

example.ex: They tackled them to the best of their ability.
example.tran: 他们竭尽全力给予解决。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment
2. possession of the qualities (especially mental qualities) required to do something or get something done;

auth_sentence.content: 'See the ability not the disability' my bottom.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'See the ability not the disability' my bottom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'See the ability not the disability' my bottom.

auth_sentence.content: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.

auth_sentence.content: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.
auth_sentence.res_content: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资
stems_affixes.word_buile: abili能力+ty表名词→n.能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资
de去掉+bility=ability[n.能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资]→n.衰弱,虚弱
de去掉+bili=abili能力+tate=ate表动词→去掉能力→使衰弱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 提供周转资金, 予以穿着
stems_affixes.word_buile: h可看作是have+abili能力+tate=ate表动词→有什么能力→使具备能力
re重新+habilitate具备能力→v.修复,恢复[职位等]

Sentence.sentence: The ability to quickly thumb through pages is also lost.

The ability to draw upon every available tool and insight—picked up from science, arts, and technology—to solve the problems of the future, and take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves, will be helpful to them and the United States
The importance of non-financial firms will accordingly rise, along with their ability to attract the best talent.
Migrants to cities are attracted by plentiful jobs, access to hospitals and education, and the ability to escape the boredom of a farmer's agricultural life.
What we want to encourage in these students is an active intellectual experience, in which they develop the wide range of complex reasoning abilities required of good lawyers.
Professor Robert Summers at Cornell Law School banned laptop computers from his thinks qualified lawyers need to possess a broad array of complex reasoning abilities

sentences.en: She has no ability in that kind of work.
sentences.cn: 她没有做那种工作的能力。

sentences.en: The ability to use a language can be acquired by the act of using the language.
sentences.cn: 运用语言的能力只能通过不断练习才能获得。

means.word_mean: 智慧, 才智; 天资, 才能, 本领

sentences.en: Most schools cater for children of different abilities.
sentences.cn: 大多数学校能够满足具有不同天资的儿童的需要。

jushi.english: The acting abilities of both were well-known.
jushi.chinese: 这两个人的表演才能是众所周知的。

jushi.english: The ability to be clearly heard is extremely important for newsreaders.
jushi.chinese: 声音洪亮清晰对新闻广播员来说极为重要。

jushi.english: Musical ability often shows itself early in life.
jushi.chinese: 音乐天才往往在幼年时期就显露出来。
